channel.title: I need hlp with telling a npc to say something
channel.description:
hey, im new at this so im just a noob but im wondering how i can change what a npc says over his head
some1 pls reply it will hlp alot[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 09:29:45 AM[/size][hr]pls some1 tell me

item.title: I need hlp with telling a npc to say something
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

i did, i replaced what the npc said but when i ran the server agian he was still saying the same thing, not the thing i changed it to. yes yes im a noob so i really dont know what im doing. pls more hlp[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 10:57:53 AM[/size][hr]pls

Read full topic
item.source: I need hlp with telling a npc to say something

item.title: I need hlp with telling a npc to say something
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

go to npc handler ill find a code to walk you thro[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 10:17:30 AM[/size][hr]ok i got it go to npchandler.java

search for moo after that add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == id here) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "what you want to say"; } }

ok change the id of the npc to which 1 you want

and where it says “what you want to say” pretty much change that to anything you want

you see

if (misc.random2(30)

change the 30 to how fast you want it to say it

hope it helps

Read full topic
